entries.title: Classic Crew Neck Tee
entries.description: A timeless staple for every man's wardrobe. This comfortable crew neck T-shirt is perfect for casual everyday wear.

entries.title: Vintage Graphic T-Shirt
entries.description: Express your style with our vintage-inspired graphic tee. Features a unique, distressed print for an authentic look.

entries.title: Performance Athletic Tee
entries.description: Designed for active lifestyles, this moisture-wicking T-shirt keeps you cool and dry during workouts or casual wear.

entries.title: Henley Long Sleeve Shirt
entries.description: A versatile long-sleeve option with a classic Henley neckline. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

entries.title: Slim Fit V-Neck Tee
entries.description: A modern, slim-fit V-neck T-shirt that flatters your physique. Ideal for a night out or casual daywear.

entries.title: Eco-Friendly Organic Cotton Tee
entries.description: Made from 100% organic cotton, this eco-conscious T-shirt combines style with sustainability.
